set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "sniper_here" );

task ( "balcony" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "8 - Run" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "sniper_here" );
}

dowait ( "balcony" );
set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
set ( "SET_ATTACK", "ON" );
